  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball(Point2D center, int radiusA, int radiusB, Color inner, Color border)
      Parameters:
      center - center position in ball
      radiusA - radius of left and right section of ball
      radiusB - radius section of up and down section of ball
      inner - colour of inner bit of ball
      border - colour of border of ball
